text: Soni ingaŵe yanti Allah akwajanguichisyaga ŵandu yakusakala (yaakuliŵendelaga mwaukali) yaakutiji pakwajanguichisya yambone (pati am’bendilemo), jingaliji jilamulidwe kukwao ndema jao (jakonasichila), basi ni tukwalekaga aŵala ŵangaakwembecheya ya kusimangana Nowe mkusokonechela mwao achiyumbagayumbaga
